structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.text: In all cases, the price of propane shall be determined by market forces. Consistent with the antitrust laws, the council may take no action and no provision of KRS 234.270 to 234.302 may be interpreted as establishing an agreement to pass along to consumers the cost of the assessments provided for in KRS 234.270 to 234.302.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1998.
